metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14680 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in mspack/chmd.c in libmspack before 0.7alpha. It does not reject blank CHM filenames.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmspack0 - 0.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> clamav in xenial+ uses the system libmspack, trusty uses the embedded one.

criterions.comment: libmspack package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5-1ubuntu0.16.04.2').
